page.title: 05MIXED FARMING
page.content: As the land in the area is not the best of agricultural land, a variety of farming uses are made of it. The majority of farms are beef farms but four of the farms in the district produce milk,though only one has a milking parlour. The milk is then collected by tanker. In one of the local farms, Mid Uplaw,where the acreage is too small to support the family, the farmer stables horses and lets out two of his fields for their pasturing. The farmer has purchased a sophisticated drainage machine and contracts his labour to nearby farmers whose waterlogged fields require much drainage. With horseriding being a favourite local pastime,several farmers are now letting fields for the pasturing of horses.
